item.title: MiniMax unveils its own open source LLM with industry-leading 4M token context
item.description: LLM MiniMax-Text-o1 is of particular note for enabling up to 4 million tokens in its context window — equivalent to a small library.

item.title: Hallucinations in AI: How GSK is addressing a critical problem in drug development
item.description: Hallucinations are a persistent problem in healthcare. Here's how GSK is using test-time compute scaling to improve its gen AI systems.

item.title: Google’s Gemini AI just shattered the rules of visual processing — here’s what that means for you
item.description: Google's Gemini AI achieves a milestone with simultaneous video and image processing, unlocking possibilities through AnyChat.

item.title: OpenAI’s agentic era begins: ChatGPT Tasks offers job scheduling, reminders and more
item.description: OpenAI will let some users schedule task reminders on ChatGPT, a sign the company may be readying itself to release an agent.

item.title: Cerebras Systems teams with Mayo Clinic on genomic model that predicts arthritis treatment
item.description: Cerebras Systems has teamed with Mayo Clinic to create an AI genomic foundation model that predicts the best medical treatments.
